meta.defaultDescription: Privacy-first organizing platform built on Nostr protocol for activist groups, co-ops, unions, and community organizers.
meta.home: Your activity feed with posts, events, and community updates from your groups.
meta.messages: Secure, end-to-end encrypted messaging for private conversations.
meta.groups: Create and manage groups for organizing, mutual aid, and community building.
meta.events: Coordinate events, rallies, workshops, and community gatherings.
meta.mutualAid: Share resources, offer help, and coordinate community support.
meta.governance: Democratic decision-making with proposals, voting, and consensus building.
meta.wiki: Collaborative knowledge base for documentation and organizing resources.
meta.crm: Manage contacts, track outreach, and coordinate campaign efforts.
meta.settings: Manage your profile, privacy, security, and notification preferences.
meta.login: Sign in to your account or create a new identity.
meta.recovery: Recover your account with your recovery phrase.
meta.notFound: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
meta.security: Security settings and encryption key management.
meta.notifications: Configure how you receive alerts and updates.
meta.privacy: Control your data visibility and privacy settings.
meta.preferences: Customize your experience with display and language settings.
meta.analytics: View engagement metrics and group activity statistics.
meta.files: Secure file storage and sharing for your groups.
meta.documents: Create and collaborate on rich text documents.
meta.database: Custom databases and structured data management.
meta.fundraising: Organize fundraising campaigns and track donations.
meta.newsletters: Create and send newsletters to your community.
meta.forms: Build custom forms for surveys, signups, and data collection.
meta.pages: Publish public-facing pages for your group or campaign.
meta.bookmarks: Your saved posts, events, and content.

login.passwordHint: Minimum 8 characters. This password encrypts your private keys.
login.importPasswordHint: This password will encrypt your imported key locally.
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
login.securityNote: Your private key will be encrypted with this password. It never leaves your device unencrypted.

recovery.title: Secure Your Account
recovery.description: Before you can use BuildIt, you need to save your recovery phrase.
recovery.descriptionWithName: Welcome, {{name}}! Before you can use BuildIt, you need to save your recovery phrase.
recovery.warningDescription: This 24-word phrase is the ONLY way to recover your account if you forget your password or lose access to your device. There is NO password reset. Write it down and store it securely offline.
recovery.confirmWrittenDown: I have written down my recovery phrase and stored it in a secure location. I understand that if I lose this phrase, I will permanently lose access to my account.
recovery.verifyDescription: Enter the requested words from your recovery phrase to confirm you have saved it correctly.
recovery.verificationFailed: One or more words are incorrect. Please check your recovery phrase and try again.
recovery.verifyHint: Can't remember? Go back to view your recovery phrase again, but make sure to write it down this time!
recovery.recoverDesc: Enter your 24-word recovery phrase to reset your password and recover access to your account.
recovery.recoverDescWithName: Enter the 24-word recovery phrase for "{{name}}" to set a new password.
recovery.secureDesc: Your recovery phrase is never sent to any server. It is only used locally to derive your private key.
recovery.invalidPhrase: Please enter a valid 24-word recovery phrase.
recovery.newPasswordDesc: Create a new password to protect your account on this device.
recovery.passwordWarning: This password encrypts your private key on this device. If you forget it, you will need your recovery phrase again.
recovery.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
recovery.successDesc: Your account has been recovered and you are now logged in.
recovery.failed: Recovery failed. Please check your recovery phrase.

logout.warningDescription: You haven't created a backup for this account. If you logout and forget your password, you may permanently lose access.
logout.noRecoveryDescription: BuildIt has no server-side password recovery. Your recovery phrase is the ONLY way to restore your account if you forget your password.
logout.identityLocked: Identity is locked. Please unlock first to view your recovery phrase.
logout.saveBackupDescription: Write down these 24 words and store them securely. This is your only way to recover your account.
logout.phraseWarning: Anyone with this phrase can access your account. Store it securely offline and never share it.

backup.reminderDescription: Your account is not backed up. Save your recovery phrase to prevent losing access.
backup.dialogDescription: This 24-word phrase is the ONLY way to recover your account if you forget your password or lose access to this device.
backup.phraseWarning: Write down these words and store them securely offline. Anyone with this phrase can access your account.

tor.title: Tor Integration
tor.description: Connect to Nostr relays through Tor for enhanced privacy and censorship resistance
tor.methodAutoDesc: Automatically detect Tor Browser or SOCKS5 proxy
tor.methodTorBrowserDesc: Use Tor Browser for .onion relay connections
tor.methodManualProxyDesc: Configure custom SOCKS5 proxy (requires local Tor daemon)
tor.onionRelaysDesc: Manage .onion Nostr relays for Tor connections
tor.fallbackClearnetDesc: Use clearnet relays if .onion relays unavailable
tor.blockWebRTCDesc: Prevent WebRTC IP leaks (requires browser extension)
tor.howToUse: How to use Tor with BuildIt Network
tor.recommendedNote: Use Tor Browser for the best privacy and security. BuildIt will automatically detect and use .onion relays.
tor.advancedNote: Run a local Tor daemon (port 9050) and enable Manual Proxy mode for desktop integration.
tor.noteNote: WebRTC and geolocation blocking require browser configuration or extensions. Tor Browser includes these protections by default.

setup.title: Set Up WebAuthn Protection
setup.description: Protect your keys with biometric authentication or a hardware security key
setup.biometricDetails: You can use Touch ID, Face ID, Windows Hello, or your device's built-in authentication.
setup.securityKeyDetails: This device doesn't support biometric authentication. You'll need a hardware security key (like a YubiKey) to continue.
setup.benefitBiometric: Protect your keys with biometrics or hardware security
setup.benefitUnauthorized: Prevent unauthorized access even if password is compromised
setup.nameDeviceDesc: Give this device a name so you can identify it later
setup.registeringDesc: Follow the prompts on your device to complete registration
setup.useBiometric: Use your fingerprint, face, or PIN to continue...
setup.insertKey: Insert and touch your security key...
setup.successDescBiometric: Your keys are now protected with biometric authentication
setup.successDescKey: Your keys are now protected with your security key
setup.successWarning: You'll now need to authenticate with WebAuthn whenever you access your keys. Make sure you can always access this device or have a backup authentication method.
setup.failedDesc: We couldn't register your WebAuthn credential
setup.troubleshootBrowser: Make sure your browser supports WebAuthn
setup.troubleshootAlreadyRegistered: Check that you haven't already registered this device
setup.troubleshootInserted: Ensure your security key is properly inserted

memberVerification.title: Member Verification
memberVerification.description: Verify members in-person to build trust and prevent infiltration
memberVerification.inPersonDesc: Scan member's QR code when you meet face-to-face
memberVerification.vouchingDesc: Vouch for members you trust to increase their trust score
memberVerification.trustScoreDesc: Calculated based on verification, vouches, and activity
memberVerification.verifiedBadgeDesc: Shows member has been verified in-person
memberVerification.qrScannerPlaceholder: QR Scanner would appear here in production
memberVerification.cameraRequired: Camera access required for in-person verification
memberVerification.lowTrustAdvice: Consider in-person verification before sharing sensitive information.

anomaly.title: Anomaly Detection
anomaly.description: Monitor suspicious behavior patterns to identify potential infiltrators
anomaly.adminRequired: Admin access required to view security anomalies
anomaly.immediateAction: Immediate investigation required. These patterns indicate potential infiltration or data harvesting.
anomaly.honeypotDesc: Honeypots are hidden documents or features that only infiltrators or bad actors would access. They appear as "sensitive" information to attract suspicious users.
anomaly.honeypotTrapQuestionsDesc: Survey questions that identify bad actors

typeDesc.massAccess: Detects rapid viewing of member profiles or documents
typeDesc.unusualPosting: Identifies spam-like or divisive posting patterns
typeDesc.rapidFollowing: Flags users building social graphs too quickly
typeDesc.honeypotTrigger: Hidden sensitive documents that only infiltrators access
typeDesc.dataExport: Monitors bulk data downloads and exports

securityDemo.title: Infiltration Countermeasures
securityDemo.description: Protect high-risk campaigns from infiltration and data harvesting
securityDemo.whyMattersDesc: High-risk organizing campaigns face constant threats from infiltrators, bad actors, and surveillance. These security features help identify and prevent malicious activity while maintaining trust within the community.
securityDemo.memberVerificationDesc: In-person QR verification and trust scores prevent fake accounts and infiltrators
securityDemo.anomalyDetectionDesc: Automated detection of suspicious behavior patterns like mass data access
securityDemo.auditLogsDesc: Complete tracking of sensitive actions for investigation and accountability

useCases.title: Real-World Use Cases
useCases.intro: These security features are essential for:
useCases.unionOrganizingDesc: Prevent employer infiltration during organizing drives
useCases.directActionDesc: Identify undercover law enforcement or informants
useCases.tenantUnionsDesc: Detect landlord-sponsored bad actors attempting to disrupt organizing
useCases.whistleblowerDesc: Protect sources from corporate or government surveillance
useCases.activistDesc: Prevent agent provocateurs from disrupting movement work
useCases.keyInsightDesc: Infiltration is not paranoia - it's a documented tactic used against organizing efforts throughout history. These tools provide systematic defense without creating a culture of suspicion.

issuesList.title: Issues
issuesList.noIssuesDescription: Create your first newsletter issue to start engaging with your subscribers.

compose.previewHint: This appears in the notification preview

scheduleDialog.title: Schedule Newsletter
scheduleDialog.description: Choose when to send this newsletter to {{count}} subscriber{{plural}}.

toasts.futureDateRequired: Scheduled time must be in the future
toasts.noSubscribers: No active subscribers to send to

privacyDemo.title: Privacy & Anonymous Engagement
privacyDemo.description: Safe participation for high-risk organizing contexts

reactions.sampleContent: "We're organizing a direct action next week to protest the evictions. All are welcome to join - safety protocols will be provided."

tips.enableAnonymous: Enable anonymous mode to hide your identity while showing support
tips.aggregateCounts: Aggregate counts are still shown to demonstrate community backing
tips.critical: Critical for high-risk campaigns where public support could lead to retaliation

tips.noTrace: Individual votes cannot be traced to voters
tips.verifiable: Results are verifiably accurate despite anonymity
tips.essential: Essential for sensitive decisions in high-risk organizing
tips.preventIntimidation: Prevents intimidation and enables honest participation

whyMatters.title: Why Anonymous Engagement Matters
whyMatters.intro: In high-risk organizing contexts (surveillance states, workplace organizing, tenant unions facing retaliation), visible support can have serious consequences:

consequences.workers: Workers organizing a union may face termination
consequences.tenants: Tenants fighting evictions may be blacklisted
consequences.activists: Activists in authoritarian states risk arrest

whyMatters.conclusion: Anonymous engagement tools allow these supporters to participate safely while still building collective power.

onboardingDemo.title: Personalized Onboarding
onboardingDemo.description: Different flows based on how users discover the platform

complete.title: Onboarding Complete!
complete.description: User would now be redirected to their personalized dashboard

about.title: About Personalized Onboarding
about.intro: Different entry points lead to different onboarding flows optimized for user context:
about.campaignDesc: Focus on specific issue, then broaden to full platform
about.eventDesc: Quick setup to get to RSVP, then explore working groups
about.friendInviteDesc: Social connection first, then community building

engagementPage.title: Your Journey
engagementPage.subtitle: Track your engagement, complete milestones, and grow as an organizer

aboutLadder.title: About the Engagement Ladder
aboutLadder.description: The Engagement Ladder is based on the Spectrum of Support methodology used by successful organizing movements. Each level represents deeper involvement in the movement:

levels.passive: Passive Support (40%) - Supporting from the sidelines
levels.active: Active Support (70%) - Actively participating in actions
levels.core: Core Organizer (100%) - Leading and developing others

aboutLadder.footer: Complete milestones at your current level to unlock the next stage of your organizing journey.

anonymizeIp.label: Anonymize IP Addresses
anonymizeIp.description: Hide or hash IP addresses in session logs for better privacy

limitFingerprinting.label: Limit Device Fingerprinting
limitFingerprinting.description: Reduce detail collected during device fingerprinting

autoExpireSessions.label: Auto-Expire Inactive Sessions
autoExpireSessions.description: Automatically end sessions that haven't been used

requireAuthNewDevice.description: Manually approve new devices before they can access your account

locationTracking.label: Enable Location Tracking
locationTracking.warning: Location tracking may compromise your privacy. Only enable if you understand the risks.

activityLogs.label: Log Device Activity
activityLogs.description: Keep a history of device activities and security events
activityLogs.warning: Disabling activity logs will make it harder to detect unauthorized access or suspicious activity.
